title: Explainer: Russian banks face exclusion as EU joins new round of sanctions
description: The United States, Britain and European Union leaders are targeting Russian banks as part of a new package of sanctions following Moscow's invasion of Ukraine.
content:
LONDON/NEW YORK, Feb 25 (Reuters) - The United States, Britain and European Union leaders are targeting Russian banks as part of a new package of sanctions following Moscow's invasion of Ukraine.
